description: Try our easy to follow Balsamic Chicken With Broccolini, Rocket & Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Broccolini,High protein,Low salt,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken
name: Balsamic Chicken With Broccolini, Rocket & Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tsp oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Season chicken. Add to pan and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Add vinegar and honey to pan and stir to combine. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 5 minutes or until sauce reduces to a thick syrup and chicken is cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat a medium frying pan or chargrill pan over high heat. Toss broccolini in 2 tsp oil and season. Cook for 2-3 minutes, turning once, or until lightly charred.
Toss salad mix with remaining oil. Slice chicken and serve with salad and broccolini topped with parmesan and drizzled with pan juices.
